From: Retailer Enquiry - DubaiMarinaMall <RetailerEnquiry@dubaimarinamall.com> 
Sent: Wednesday, July 3, 2024 9:01 AM
Cc: DMM Retail Relationship <DMM_Retailrelationship@emaar.ae>
Subject: MEMO# 1729 Mandatory Insurance Policies and Trade License

 

Dear Valued Retailers,

 

Following the previously issued memo on 2nd of April 2024, all retailers are reminded to upload into the Tenant Portal the Insurance Policies and Trade License for all your leased units in Dubai Marina Mall and Marina Retails, as stipulated in the signed Lease Agreement Clause 5.6.1 and as mentioned below:

 

1.	Mandatory Insurance Policies

a.	Property All Risk 
b.	Plate Glass
c.	Business Interruption/Increased Cost of Working/Gross Profit/Loss of Profit
d.	Third Party Liability – Limit of Indemnity should be AED 5 million and above
e.	Workmen’s Compensation/Employer’s Liability

 

Please be informed that the above documents are part of the requirements upon processing any request from the Management such as NOCs, permits, and other related services, hence, kindly ensure that all documents are complete and updated.

 

Submission of physical documents are no longer accepted. 

 

Note: You can only access the Tenant Portal (link below), if you already have the username and password given by Emaar IT.

https://retailservices.emaarmalls.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fretailservices.emaarmalls.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C4a17bb547370421be7e208dce9cd454d%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638642315078351223%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=ciCChLPEdBgbho2YdnZ7NhBecaoBAJI7KTm7eWctr58%3D&reserved=0>

From: Retailer Enquiry - DubaiMarinaMall <RetailerEnquiry@dubaimarinamall.com <mailto:RetailerEnquiry@dubaimarinamall.com> > 
Sent: Wednesday, July 3, 2024 9:01 AM
Cc: DMM Retail Relationship <DMM_Retailrelationship@emaar.ae <mailto:DMM_Retailrelationship@emaar.ae> >
Subject: MEMO# 1729 Mandatory Insurance Policies and Trade License

 

Dear Valued Retailers,

 

Following the previously issued memo on 2nd of April 2024, all retailers are reminded to upload into the Tenant Portal the Insurance Policies and Trade License for all your leased units in Dubai Marina Mall and Marina Retails, as stipulated in the signed Lease Agreement Clause 5.6.1 and as mentioned below:

 

1.	Mandatory Insurance Policies

a.	Property All Risk 
b.	Plate Glass
c.	Business Interruption/Increased Cost of Working/Gross Profit/Loss of Profit
d.	Third Party Liability – Limit of Indemnity should be AED 5 million and above
e.	Workmen’s Compensation/Employer’s Liability

 

Please be informed that the above documents are part of the requirements upon processing any request from the Management such as NOCs, permits, and other related services, hence, kindly ensure that all documents are complete and updated.

 

Submission of physical documents are no longer accepted. 

 

Note: You can only access the Tenant Portal (link below), if you already have the username and password given by Emaar IT.

https://retailservices.emaarmalls.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fretailservices.emaarmalls.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C4a17bb547370421be7e208dce9cd454d%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638642315078351223%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=ciCChLPEdBgbho2YdnZ7NhBecaoBAJI7KTm7eWctr58%3D&reserved=0>

esday, July 3, 2024 9:01 AM
Cc: DMM Retail Relationship <DMM_Retailrelationship@emaar.ae <mailto:DMM_Retailrelationship@emaar.ae> >
Subject: MEMO# 1729 Mandatory Insurance Policies and Trade License

 

Dear Valued Retailers,

 

Following the previously issued memo on 2nd of April 2024, all retailers are reminded to upload into the Tenant Portal the Insurance Policies and Trade License for all your leased units in Dubai Marina Mall and Marina Retails, as stipulated in the signed Lease Agreement Clause 5.6.1 and as mentioned below:

 

1.	Mandatory Insurance Policies

a.	Property All Risk 
b.	Plate Glass
